2014 Cheltenham Gold Cup Betting Without Favourite

Bobs Worth is heading to the 2014 Cheltenham Gold Cup aiming for his second victory in the race and he goes into the race as a warm favourite to do just that following an excellent season so far. That means that the Gold Cup Betting Without Long Run is an excellent way for punters to have a good value bet on the race, this market assumes that Long Run will win the race leaving punters with the task of picking the runner-up.

This means that punters will win if their horse either comes second behind Long Run or if he does the impossible and beats the favourite and wins the Gold Cup,
